issue: union-union member dispute (except as pertains to union or closed shop)

caseTitle: Linden Lumber Division, Summer & Company v. National Labor Relations Board
issue: labor-management disputes: bargaining

caseTitle: Hudgens v. National Labor Relations Board
issue: First Amendment, miscellaneous (cf. comity: First Amendment)

caseTitle: Oil, Chemical & Atomic Workers International Union, AFL-CIO v. Mobil Oil Corporation
issue: labor-management disputes: miscellaneous dispute

issue: union-union member dispute (except as pertains to union or closed shop)

issue: labor-management disputes: distribution of union literature

issue: labor-management disputes: right to organize

issue: labor-management disputes: secondary activity

caseTitle: H. A. Artists & Associates, Inc. v. Actors' Equity Assn.
issue: union antitrust: legality of anticompetitive union activity

issue: judicial administration: jurisdiction or authority of federal district courts or territorial courts

caseTitle: Woelke & Romero Framing, Inc. v. National Labor Relations Board
issue: union antitrust: legality of anticompetitive union activity

issue: federal pre-emption of state court jurisdiction

caseTitle: United Brotherhood of Carpenters & Joiners of America, Local 610, AFL-CIO v. Scott

issue: union or closed shop: includes agency shop litigation

caseTitle: Garcia v. San Antonio Metro. Transit Authority
issue: Fair Labor Standards Act

caseTitle: Brown v. Department of Law and Public Safety
issue: federal pre-emption of state legislation or regulation. cf. state regulation of business. rarely involves union activity. Does not involve constitutional interpretation unless the Court says it does.

caseTitle: Pattern Makers' League of North America, AFL-CIO v. National Labor Relations Board
issue: union-union member dispute (except as pertains to union or closed shop)

issue: union or closed shop: includes agency shop litigation

issue: labor-management disputes: representative election

caseTitle: AT&T Technologies, Inc. v. Communications Workers of America

caseTitle: International Brotherhood of Electrical Workers, AFL-CIO v. Hechler
issue: federal pre-emption of state court jurisdiction

caseTitle: West v. Connrail
issue: union-union member dispute (except as pertains to union or closed shop)

caseTitle: North Star Steel Company v. Thomas
issue: subconstitutional fair procedure: timeliness

caseTitle: Hughes Aircraft Company v. United States ex rel. Schumer
issue: liability, other than as in sufficiency of evidence, election of remedies, punitive damages

caseTitle: Devlin v. Scardelletti
issue: Federal Rules of Civil Procedure including Supreme Court Rules, application of the Federal Rules of Evidence, Federal Rules of Appellate Procedure in civil litigation, Circuit Court Rules, and state rules and admiralty rules
